import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-webinar-card', templateUrl: './webinar-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./webinar-card.component.scss'] }) export class WebinarCardComponent { @Input() postData:any; @Input() page: string=''; }

by {{postData.org.name}}

KEY HIGHLIGHTS {{postData.highlights}}

{{postData.liveOn}}
